title: As a client who believes my solicitor's bill is too expensive, I need to challenge my solicitor's bill, so that the bill can be reduced (103285)

details.impact: Has serious consequences for your users and/or their customers
justifications: It's something that people can do or it's something people need to know before they can do something that's regulated by/related to government
There is clear demand for it from users
It's something the government provides/does/pays for
met_when: knows what actions they need to take before applying
knows which third parties can offer help and advice
knows how to send their application to the court
understands the costs implications of winning and losing
knows which cases can and can't be claimed for
knows how to challenge a decision of the SCCO
details.role: client who believes my solicitor's bill is too expensive

available_translations.title: As a client who believes my solicitor's bill is too expensive, I need to challenge my solicitor's bill, so that the bill can be reduced (103285)
